base.name: Relay
base.description: The Relay block allows its output to switch between two specified values.
base.development_notes: this block initial_state should not be exposed to the user, it defaults to off_value.

parameter_definitions.name: on_threshold
parameter_definitions.description: threshold above which the output will switch to the on_value

parameter_definitions.name: off_threshold
parameter_definitions.description: threshold below which the output will switch to the off_value

parameter_definitions.name: on_value
parameter_definitions.description: output value when in on state

parameter_definitions.name: off_value
parameter_definitions.description: output value when in off state
